Source code for blend.galaxy.datasets

"""
Contains possible interactions with the Galaxy Workflows
"""
import requests
import simplejson


[docs]class DatasetClient(object):
    def __init__(self, galaxy_instance):
        self.gi = galaxy_instance
        self.module = 'datasets'
        self.url = '/'.join([self.gi.url, self.module])


[docs]    def show_dataset(self, dataset_id, deleted=False):
        """
        Display information about and/or content of a dataset.
        """
        url = self.gi._make_url(self, dataset_id, deleted=deleted)
        r = self.gi.make_get_request(url)
        return r.json
